title: Poster, "Libertad de Cultos (for the Asuntos Interamericanos)", 1942
medium: Offset lithograph on off-white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted in orange across lower section: UNA DE LAS CUATRO LIBERTADES / POR LAS QUE LUCHAN LOS ALIADOS
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Before a Latin Cross a sword thrusts through a shredded Nazi flag. Background a deep blue and brown earth is suggested along lower edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Libertad de Cultos (for the Asuntos Interamericanos)", 1942.
1942. Offset lithograph on off-white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-129.
